mapper.select: SELECT * FROM signRecord WHERE user_id=#{user_id} AND course_id=#{course_id} AND date BETWEEN #{start_date} AND #{end_date}
SELECT * FROM signRecord WHERE user_id=#{user_id} AND course_id=#{course_id} AND signInTime $gt; (#{shouldSignTime} + #{lateTime})
SELECT * FROM signRecord WHERE user_id=#{user_id} AND course_id=#{course_id} AND signInTime $lt; (#{shouldSignTime} - #{earlyLeaveTime})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO signRecord(user_id, course_id, sign_date, signInTime, signOutTime) VALUES(#{user_id}, #{course_id}, #{sign_date}, #{signInTime}, #{signOutTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE signRecord SET signInTime=#{signInTime} WHERE user_id=#{user_id} AND course_id=#{course_id} AND sign_date=#{sign_date} AND signInTime=0
UPDATE signRecord SET signOutTime=#{signOutTime} WHERE user_id=#{user_id} AND course_id=#{course_id} AND sign_date=#{sign_date} AND signOutTime=0
